videos.headline: Thomas rushes in for 5-yard TD
videos.description: Appalachian State extends its lead with a quarterback keeper by Zac Thomas.

videos.headline: Thomas throws 2nd App St. TD
videos.description: Zac Thomas connects with Corey Sutton for a 27-yard Appalachian State touchdown.
